chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let z0 := bottom m zero z in ~ betweene m z0 x z -> ~ MA0.expo m z0 x \/ (forall i j : nat, x = Iter (MA0.f m) i z0 -> z = Iter (MA0.f m) j z0 -> (i < MA0.Iter_upb m z0)%nat -> (j < MA0.Iter_upb m z0)%nat -> (j <= i)%nat)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
betweene = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => MA0.between m z v t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
bottom_B0_ter : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in let zj := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in let m0 := B m zero zi in (j <= i < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> bottom m0 zero zj = bottom m zero zj
bottom_B0_quad : forall (m : fmap) (z v : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let m0 := B m zero v in let t := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in (j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> ~ MA0.expo m z v -> bottom m0 zero t = bottom m zero t
bottom_B0_bis : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in let zj := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in let m0 := B m zero zi in (i < j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> bottom m0 zero zj = A m zero zi
MA0.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) j z = Iter (MA0.f m) k z -> j = k
expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in xb0 = Iter (cF m) j x_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_b_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in let p := MF.Iter_upb m xh0_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i xh0_1 in x0 = Iter (cF m) j xh0_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
MA0.mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
MA0.degree_unicity : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.degree m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) j z = Iter (MA0.f m) k z -> j = k
succ_zi : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> (i + 1 < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in succ m zero zi
MA0.period_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (0 < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < nr)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> z)
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
MA0.ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.upb_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> (MA0.Iter_upb m x + MA0.Iter_upb m y <= ndN m)%nat
MA0.expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, (i < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.incls_minus : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> let s := fmap_to_set m in let sx := MA0.Iter_orb m x in let sy := MA0.Iter_orb m y in incls sy (set_minus s sx)
MA0.degree_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> (MA0.degree m x + MA0.degree m y <= ndN m)%nat
expe_bottom_ind : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let t := Iter (cA m zero) i z in bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t
MA0.exds_orb_eq_ex_large : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := MA0.Iter_orb m z in let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exds s t < -> (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t)
MA0.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.Iter_upb m z = MA0.Iter_upb m (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
MA0.P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, (n0 < j <= nr - 1)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MA0.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
MA0.disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> disjs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
MA0.disjs_orb_not_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> disjs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y) -> ~ MA0.expo m x y
MA0.card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (MA0.Iter_orb m x) = MA0.Iter_upb m x
MA0.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z
MA0.LP7 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, (n0 < j <= nr - 1)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MA0.f m) j z
MA0.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MA0.not_expo_disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y < -> disjs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
betweene_dec1 : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m v -> betweene m z v t \/ ~ betweene m z v t
MA0.Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.orb_impls_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> impls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y) -> MA0.expo m x y
MA0.Iter_plus_inv : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MA0.Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i z -> Iter (MA0.f m) p z = z
MA0.expo_eq_eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> MA0.expo m x y < -> eqs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
MA0.diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, (a <= i)%nat /\ (i < j <= b)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) i z <> Iter (MA0.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
MF.f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.f_1 m (Iter (MF.f m) (S i) z) = Iter (MF.f m) i z
MA0.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MA0.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop

``` 
intros m x z H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10.
intros z0 H11 H12 H13 H14 H15.
intros H16.
intro H17.
left.
intro H18.
destruct H18 as [i [j [H19 [H20 [H21 H22]]]]].
apply not_le_lt in H22.
apply lt_le_weak in H22.
apply H17 in H19.
contradiction.
```

original: intros m x z H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10. intros z0 H11 H12 H13 H14 H15. intros H16. intro H17. left. intro H18. destruct H18 as [i [j [H19 [H20 [H21 H22]]]]]. apply not_le_lt in H22. apply lt_le_weak in H22. apply H17 in H19. contradiction.
